mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_INFO( RANK_CHECK_TIME, SEQ, RANK, NAME, RESERVE, SCORE, OPEN_DAY, REG_ID, CHG_ID ) VALUES ( #{rank_check_time}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.SEQ),0)+1 FROM MOVIE_INFO A WHERE A.RANK_CHECK_TIME=#{rank_check_time}), #{rank}, #{name}, #{reserve}, #{score}, #{open_day}, #{reg_id}, #{reg_id} )
